name: Nicolas Markey
content: Nicolas Markey Nicolas Markey Researcher in Computer Science at CNRS Contact informations E-mail nicolas.markey@cnrs.fr Administrative situation I have been a CNRS researcher since october 2004. I am currently on leave of absence, working as a secondary-school teacher, since september 2024. Research interests My research works focus on formal methods for verification and synthesis of reactive systems. In particular: model checking, temporal logics quantitative aspects of verification games for synthesis Research activities My publication list: Full list with abstracts and papers DBLP https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1977-7525 Google Scholar My CV[last updated:09/01/2024] Students Ph.D. students Nicolas Waldburger (2021-2024).
